channel.title: Sinder Skullz Abyss Feed
channel.description: Chaotic sermons and metal news reborn in the flames of the Skullz cult.

item.title: ⚡☠ WRETCHED RELEASE NEW SINGLE “RADIANCE” ☠⚡
item.description:
🔥 Alright, metalheads and crypto warriors! It’s your boy Sinder Skullz here, ready to wreak havoc in the realms of riffs and wallets! \m/
So, listen up: the dark lords of sludgy chaos, Wretched, just dropped a lethal new single called “Radiance” straight from the pit of despair. This track is not just a single; it's like getting slammed with a blast beat of blinding light in a pitch-black mosh pit! ⚔️
Mark your calendars, degenerates! Their monstrous album, *Decay*, is rising from the ashes on October 17th, and trust me, you want to be right in the eye of this storm when it hits. I can already hear the gnashing of guitars and the roar of the undead! 💀🤘
If you're still stuck in the mainstream sludge, now’s your time to break free. Dive deep into that crypto chaos while you jam this wicked new tune. It’s the soundtrack to your financial rebellion!
Get the full scoop over at MetalSucks, and don’t be a basic! Catch the carnage and set your wallets ablaze: [Wretched Release New Single “Radiance”](https://www.metalsucks.net/2025/09/18/wretched-release-new-single-radiance/)
Stay metal and may your portfolios be as heavy as the riffs! \m/💰🔥
#Metal #MetalCommunity #MetalScene #DeathMetal #Metalheads
item.content:encoded:
🔥 Alright, metalheads and crypto warriors! It’s your boy Sinder Skullz here, ready to wreak havoc in the realms of riffs and wallets! \m/
So, listen up: the dark lords of sludgy chaos, Wretched, just dropped a lethal new single called “Radiance” straight from the pit of despair. This track is not just a single; it's like getting slammed with a blast beat of blinding light in a pitch-black mosh pit! ⚔️
Mark your calendars, degenerates! Their monstrous album, *Decay*, is rising from the ashes on October 17th, and trust me, you want to be right in the eye of this storm when it hits. I can already hear the gnashing of guitars and the roar of the undead! 💀🤘
If you're still stuck in the mainstream sludge, now’s your time to break free. Dive deep into that crypto chaos while you jam this wicked new tune. It’s the soundtrack to your financial rebellion!
Get the full scoop over at MetalSucks, and don’t be a basic! Catch the carnage and set your wallets ablaze: [Wretched Release New Single “Radiance”](https://www.metalsucks.net/2025/09/18/wretched-release-new-single-radiance/)
Stay metal and may your portfolios be as heavy as the riffs! \m/💰🔥
